text: Lila Diane Sawyer (born December 22, 1945) is an American television broadcast journalist who became the first female newscaster on the CBS television news program 60 Minutes. She was a co-anchor of ABC's morning news program Good Morning America, and was the anchor of ABC World News Tonight until 2014. She became anchor in 2009 after Charles Gibson left the news. == References == Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Journalists from Kentucky Category:American television news anchors
title: Diane Sawyer
